All Known Implementing Classes:
RMISender, SocketSender

    • sendError

      void sendError(String errorMsg)
      Sends an error message to the client.
      Parameters:
      errorMsg - Error message

      Sends the list of matches to the client.
      Parameters:
      matches - List of matches
      playerID - ID of the player

      void createMatchResult(int matchID, String hostNickname)
      Sends the ID of the created match to the client.
      Parameters:
      matchID - ID of the match
      hostNickname - Nickname of the host

    • selectMatchResult

      void selectMatchResult(int matchID, List<String> nicknames)
      Sends the result of the match selection to the client.
      Parameters:
      matchID - ID of the match
      nicknames - List of nicknames

    • chooseNicknameResult

      void chooseNicknameResult(String nickname)
      Sends the result of the nickname choice to the client.
      Parameters:
      nickname - Chosen nickname

    • sendGameStart

      void sendGameStart(Map<Integer,String> IDtoOpponentNickname, int resDeckCardID, int visibleResCardID1, int visibleResCardID2, int goldDeckCardID, int visibleGoldCardID1, int visibleGoldCardID2, int starterCardID)
      Sends all the information needed to start the game.
      Parameters:
      IDtoOpponentNickname - Map of player IDs to nicknames
      resDeckCardID - ID of the resource deck card
      visibleResCardID1 - ID of the first visible resource card
      visibleResCardID2 - ID of the second visible resource card
      goldDeckCardID - ID of the gold deck card
      visibleGoldCardID1 - ID of the first visible gold card
      visibleGoldCardID2 - ID of the second visible gold card
      starterCardID - ID of the starter card

    • sendMissingSetup

      void sendMissingSetup(int resourceCardID1, int resourceCardID2, int goldenCardID, TokenColors tokenColor, int commonObjectiveCardID1, int commonObjectiveCardID2, int secretObjectiveCardID1, int secretObjectiveCardID2)
      Confirms the placement of the starter card and sends all information needed to complete the setup phase
      Parameters:
      resourceCardID1 - ID of the first resource card
      resourceCardID2 - ID of the second resource card
      goldenCardID - ID of the golden card
      tokenColor - Token color
      commonObjectiveCardID1 - ID of the first common objective card
      commonObjectiveCardID2 - ID of the second common objective card
      secretObjectiveCardID1 - ID of the first secret objective card
      secretObjectiveCardID2 - ID of the second secret objective card

    • confirmSecretObjective

      void confirmSecretObjective()
      Confirms the choice of the secret objective card.

    • placeCard

      void placeCard(int playerID, int cardID, Position pos, CardSideType chosenSide, int score)
      Sends the result of the card placement.
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the player that placed the card
      cardID - ID of the card
      pos - Position of the card
      chosenSide - Side of the card
      score - Score of the placement

    • sendFirstPlayerTurn

      void sendFirstPlayerTurn(int lastPlayerID, int playerID, int[] playerIDs, int[] starterCardIDs, CardSideType[] starterCardSides, TokenColors[] tokenColors, int[][] playerHands, int resDeckCardID, int visibleResCardID1, int visibleResCardID2, int goldDeckCardID, int visibleGoldCardID1, int visibleGoldCardID2)
      Notifies all players of the first turn of the game.
      Parameters:
      lastPlayerID - ID of the last player to complete the setup phase
      playerID - ID of the player that starts the game
      playerIDs - IDs of all players in the game
      starterCardIDs - IDs of the starter cards of each player
      starterCardSides - Sides of the starter cards of each player
      tokenColors - Token colors of each player
      playerHands - Hands of each player
      resDeckCardID - ID of the resource deck card
      visibleResCardID1 - ID of the first visible resource card
      visibleResCardID2 - ID of the second visible resource card
      goldDeckCardID - ID of the gold deck card
      visibleGoldCardID1 - ID of the first visible gold card
      visibleGoldCardID2 - ID of the second visible gold card

    • sendFirstPlayerTurn

      void sendFirstPlayerTurn(int playerID, int[] playerIDs, int[] starterCardIDs, CardSideType[] starterCardSides, TokenColors[] tokenColors, int[][] playerHands, int resDeckCardID, int visibleResCardID1, int visibleResCardID2, int goldDeckCardID, int visibleGoldCardID1, int visibleGoldCardID2)
      Notifies all players of the first turn of the game, when the game starts after a player reconnection.
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the player that starts the game
      playerIDs - IDs of all players in the game
      starterCardIDs - IDs of the starter cards of each player
      starterCardSides - Sides of the starter cards of each player
      tokenColors - Token colors of each player
      playerHands - Hands of each player
      resDeckCardID - ID of the resource deck card
      visibleResCardID1 - ID of the first visible resource card
      visibleResCardID2 - ID of the second visible resource card
      goldDeckCardID - ID of the gold deck card
      visibleGoldCardID1 - ID of the first visible gold card
      visibleGoldCardID2 - ID of the second visible gold card

    • sendNewPlayerTurn

      void sendNewPlayerTurn(int drawnCardID, int lastPlayerID, int newPlayerID, int resDeckCardID, int visibleResCardID1, int visibleResCardID2, int goldDeckCardID, int visibleGoldCardID1, int visibleGoldCardID2)
      Notifies all players of the new turn of a player.
      Parameters:
      drawnCardID - ID of the drawn card
      lastPlayerID - ID of the last player acting
      newPlayerID - ID of the player that starts the new turn
      resDeckCardID - ID of the resource deck card
      visibleResCardID1 - ID of the first visible resource card
      visibleResCardID2 - ID of the second visible resource card
      goldDeckCardID - ID of the gold deck card
      visibleGoldCardID1 - ID of the first visible gold card
      visibleGoldCardID2 - ID of the second visible gold card

    • sendNewPlayerExtraTurn

      void sendNewPlayerExtraTurn(int cardID, int lastPlayerID, Position pos, CardSideType side, int newPlayerID, int score)
      Notifies all players of the new turn of a player during the extra turn game phase.
      Parameters:
      cardID - ID of the placed card
      lastPlayerID - ID of the last player acting
      pos - Position of the card
      side - Side of the card
      newPlayerID - ID of the player that starts the new turn
      score - Score of the placement

    • sendNewPlayerTurnNewState

      void sendNewPlayerTurnNewState(int drawnCardID, int lastPlayerID, int newPlayerID, int resDeckCardID, int visibleResCardID1, int visibleResCardID2, int goldDeckCardID, int visibleGoldCardID1, int visibleGoldCardID2, GameState gameState)
      Notifies all players of the new turn of a player and the new game state.
      Parameters:
      drawnCardID - ID of the drawn card
      lastPlayerID - ID of the last player acting
      newPlayerID - ID of the player that starts the new turn
      resDeckCardID - ID of the resource deck card
      visibleResCardID1 - ID of the first visible resource card
      visibleResCardID2 - ID of the second visible resource card
      goldDeckCardID - ID of the gold deck card
      visibleGoldCardID1 - ID of the first visible gold card
      visibleGoldCardID2 - ID of the second visible gold card
      gameState - New game state

    • sendChatMessage

      void sendChatMessage(String sender, String recipient, String message)
      Sends a chat message to the recipient.
      Parameters:
      sender - Sender of the message
      recipient - Recipient of the message
      message - Message to send

    • sendRanking

      void sendRanking(int lastPlayerID, int cardID, Position pos, CardSideType side, int deltaScore, String[] nicknames, int[] scores, int[] numOfSecretObjectives)
      Sends the ranking of the players.
      Parameters:
      lastPlayerID - ID of the last player acting
      cardID - ID of the last card placed
      pos - Position of the card
      side - Side of the card
      deltaScore - Points scored by the last player
      nicknames - Nicknames of the players (in order)
      scores - Scores of the players
      numOfSecretObjectives - Number of secret objectives of the players

    • sendPlayerDisconnection

      void sendPlayerDisconnection(int playerID)
      Notifies all players of a player disconnection.
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the disconnected player

    • sendPlayerDisconnectionWithOnePlayerLeft

      void sendPlayerDisconnectionWithOnePlayerLeft(int playerID)
      Notifies the only remaining player of a player disconnection.
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the disconnected player

    • sendReOnStarterPlacement

      void sendReOnStarterPlacement(int playerID, Map<Integer,String> IDToNicknameMap, int[] gameSetupCards)
      Sends the reconnected player the information needed to complete the setup phase (On starter card placement).
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the reconnected player
      IDToNicknameMap - Map of player IDs to nicknames
      gameSetupCards - IDs of the cards needed for the setup phase

    • sendReOnObjectiveChoice

      void sendReOnObjectiveChoice(int playerID, Map<Integer,String> IDToNicknameMap, int[] gameSetupCards, CardSideType starterSide, TokenColors tokenColor)
      Sends the reconnected player the information needed to complete the setup phase (On objective card choice).
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the reconnected player
      IDToNicknameMap - Map of player IDs to nicknames
      gameSetupCards - IDs of the cards needed for the setup phase
      starterSide - Side of the starter card
      tokenColor - Token color

    • sendReAfterSetup

      void sendReAfterSetup(int playerID, Map<Integer,String> IDToNicknameMap, int[] gameSetupCards, CardSideType starterSide, TokenColors tokenColor)
      Sends the reconnected player the information needed to complete the setup phase (After completing the setup).
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the reconnected player
      IDToNicknameMap - Map of player IDs to nicknames
      gameSetupCards - IDs of the cards needed for the setup phase
      starterSide - Side of the starter card
      tokenColor - Token color

    • sendNormalReconnect

      void sendNormalReconnect(int playerID, int[] playersIDs, String[] playersNicknames, TokenColors[] playersTokenColors, int[][] playersHands, List<Position[]> playersPlacedCardsPos, List<int[]> playersPlacedCardsIDs, List<CardSideType[]> playersPlacedCardsSides, List<int[]> playersPlacedCardsPriorities, int[] playersScores, int[] gameSetupCards, int currPlayerID)
      Sends the reconnected player the information needed to complete the setup phase (During normal turn phase).
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the reconnected player
      playersIDs - IDs of other players
      playersNicknames - Nicknames of other players
      playersTokenColors - Token colors of other players
      playersHands - Hands of other players
      playersPlacedCardsPos - Positions of the placed cards of other players
      playersPlacedCardsIDs - IDs of the placed cards of other players
      playersPlacedCardsSides - Sides of the placed cards of other players
      playersPlacedCardsPriorities - Priorities of the placed cards of other players
      playersScores - Scores of other players
      gameSetupCards - IDs of the cards needed for the setup phase
      currPlayerID - ID of the current player

    • sendUndoCardPlacement

      void sendUndoCardPlacement(int playerID, Position pos, int score, int nextPlayerID)
      Notifies all players of the request to undo the last card placement.
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the player that requested the undo
      pos - Position of the card
      score - Score of the placement
      nextPlayerID - ID of the player that starts the new turn

    • sendUndoPlaceWithOnePlayerLeft

      void sendUndoPlaceWithOnePlayerLeft(int playerID, Position pos, int score)
      Notifies all players of the request to undo the last card placement with only one player remaining online.
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the player that requested the undo
      pos - Position of the card
      score - Score of the placement

    • sendPlayerReconnection

      void sendPlayerReconnection(int playerID)
      Notifies all players of the reconnection of a player.
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the reconnected player

    • sendSoleWinnerMessage

      void sendSoleWinnerMessage()
      Sends the only remaining player a messages that the game is over, and he is the only winner.

    • sendPing

      void sendPing()
      Sends a ping message to the client.
